price: 39. Ugana dig Maalinta qoomamada, marka arrinka la gooyo, haddase dhoohnaan baa heysa, mana rumeeyaan (Xaqa).
arabic: وَأَنذِرۡهُمۡ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡحَسۡرَةِ إِذۡ قُضِيَ ٱلۡأَمۡرُ وَهُمۡ فِي غَفۡلَةٖ وَهُمۡ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-andhir'hum yawma al-ḥasrati idh quḍiya al-amru wahum fī ghaflatin wahum lā yu'minūna
